Among those who came forward were some who have been attending our meetings in the past and who have become interested in the truth. May they decide to place themselves wholly on the Lord's side. May they have the courage to receive and live the truth. I felt from my heart that we could say to them, "Come thou with us, and we will do thee good; for the Lord hath spoken good concerning Israel. . . . It shall be, if thou go with us, yea, it 


                                    -253- 

shall be, that what goodness the Lord shall do unto us, the same will we do unto thee."
